snippet: Parliament members found grounds to strip a lawmaker of his post, heightening tension days before another opposition march is planned for this weekend.
abstract: Russian Parliament moves step closer to stripping opposition lawmaker Gennadi V Gudkov of his post, heightening tension days before a planned march; Gudkov, who has emerged as one of the few political insiders to persistently challenge the Kremlin, is accused of operating a business while serving in the Legislature, which is prohibited by Russian law.
lead_paragraph: Parliament members found grounds to strip a lawmaker of his post, heightening tension days before another opposition march is planned for this weekend.

headline.seo: Showdown Looms Over Planned Anti-Kremlin March
headline.main: Parliament Raises Stakes Before Anti-Kremlin March
headline.print_headline: Parliament Raises Stakes Before Anti-Kremlin March
